name: Unseen Chat Compact View
description:
https://unseen.is - COMPACT VIEW
::Unseen is a free service for strong, secure and private communications.
::This style basically changes the layout, and removes those wasting spaces. For desktop users, it allows to have a decently small chatting window on, while working in other windows. For mobile uses, it really helps to make the messages much much easier to read.
::Note: the example image need "Unseen Chat Font" + "Unseen Chat Compact View" installed
